We offer a range of courses to help people upgrade their skills and use modern spatial analysis tools effectively. Our course materials are shared freely and under an open license suitable for self-study. You can access the courses through the links below.


## Full-length Courses
* [Spatial Data Visualization and Analytics](spatial-data-viz.html)
* [Advanced QGIS](advanced-qgis.html)
* [Python Foundation for Spatial Analysis](python-foundation.html)
* [Customizing QGIS with Python](pyqgis-in-a-day.html)
* [Mastering GDAL Tools](gdal-tools.html)
* [End-to-End Google Earth Engine](end-to-end-gee.html)


## Short Courses
* [Automating GIS Workflows with QGIS](automating-gis-workflows.html)

---

These courses are also offered as online instructor-led classes. The online classes cover these materials in much more depth - with discussion, Q&A and support - in a unique teaching style that helps you to learn the nuances and apply these skills to your own spatial analysis problems. We are also a QGIS.org certifying organization and offer affordable programs to earn globally recognized official QGIS.org certification. Visit the [Courses Homepage](https://spatialthoughts.com/courses/) to learn more.
